column1: [93]  In  these  circumstances,  I  answer  questions  of  law  arising  in  the  case
stated in favour of the Appellant and against the Respondent as follows:

column3: b) The mere existence of a place of business of an overseas company
in  terms  of  Part  XVIII  of  the  Companies  Act,  No.  07  of  2007  did  not
disentitle  the  Appellant  as  a  resident  company  of  the  benefit  of  the
services to the local branch office that carried on business in Sri Lanka.
